overview:
Bryant Quan is the CEO of Slickdeals. He first joined the company in 2004, after offering the website owner his web design services for free. After an early redesign, Bryant continued to work with Slickdeals focusing on User Experience where Bryant created additional website features and provided business guidance to the young tech-heavy deal sharing site. Bryant’s role expanded to include Product Design and Business Development and became the company’s CEO in 2008 after obtaining his MBA from the University of Arizona. As CEO, Bryant has been integral to Slickdeals’ explosive growth, increasing revenues by over 400% while maintaining unparalleled profit margins.

Prior to Slickdeals, Bryant held various technical and managerial positions in telecommunications, eCommerce and consulting, most notably at NEC Unified Solutions and Phoenix Networks and Design.
